duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and modify engineered labor standards in warehouse operations.
Support regional projects in warehouse automation, facility layout, and transportation.
Train warehouse and delivery staff in efficient work methods and maintain work standards.
Perform process simulations to assess impact on labor productivity and incentive programs.
Serve as a subject matter expert in work methods, efficiency techniques, and labor management software.
Monitor warehouse and delivery operations to measure productivity metrics and identify efficiencies.
Maintain high-level relations with vendors throughout the implementation process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, required (Industrial Engineering degree preferred).
